Text:
I think this torrent is dead. Found it somewhere else, sorry but unable to add a link to it on here.

Just google under "camouflage and markings 13 B-17 Flying Fortress, download" and select the page from rapidlibrary, then scroll down and you'll find a link for B-17. Click it and then click the next hyperlink where it says file download URL and wait 60 seconds for the download to start - got mine that way.
